Articles.Content: How would one go about modifying the probe rover core to be able to collect samples? Or any part for that matter. Being able to take samples and transmit remotely should be possible.

MODULE

{

name = ModuleScienceExperiment

experimentID = crewReport

experimentActionName = Crew Report

resetActionName = Discard Crew Report

reviewActionName = Review Report

useStaging = False

useActionGroups = True

hideUIwhenUnavailable = True

rerunnable = True

xmitDataScalar = 1.0

}

MODULE

{

name = ModuleScienceContainer

reviewActionName = Review Stored Data

storeActionName = Store Experiments

evaOnlyStorage = True

storageRange = 2.0

}

taken from stock pod
That's how a probe core receives samples from a Kerbal. I believe Leonassan is asking how to pick up samples.
